Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2008 01:24PM lexio wrote: My pathologist report came back and its B9!!!!!  After the doctors who gave me my mammogram said he was almost totally certain I had DCIS!  ITS B9!   Thank you for all the wonderful support I have gotten on this site!  You are a great group of women.  Thanks thank you thanks!  so much!  I cant thank you girls enough!
Posts.Title: Just wondering if my wait will really be that long lexio lvtwoqlt

Posts.Content: lexio wrote: Yesterday I was just so happy to be done with the sterio biopsy that it didnt seem to be too bad to have to wait until Friday for the results.  Now that its morning I am getting anxious for them.  I was told Friday but I am wondering if they tell you the time that would be the latest you would here the results.  So that you dont keep calling kwim?  So I am wondering how long it took for others to get their results from their sterio biopsies?  I thought my friend who was diagnosed with DCIS got hers the very next morning?  Thank you in advance for sharing your experiences :).
